headline: Vortex Energy Highlights 2025 Technical Milestones Across Project Portfolio and Announces Adjournment of AGM to February 13, 2026
summary: Technical work completed at Robinsons River and Fire Eye supports next-stage exploration planningVANCOUVER, British Columbia, Jan. 21, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Vortex Energy Corp. (CSE: VRTX) (OTC: VTECF) (FSE: AA3) (“Vortex” or the “Company”) is pleased to provide a year-in-review summary of technical milestones achieved in 2025, along with a preview of the Company’s exploration plans for 2026. The Company also notes that its annual general meeting (AGM) has been adjourned to February 13, 2026,
